com.ibm.gaiandb.apps.sensormonitor

Class SensorMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.gaiandb.apps.DBConnector
      • com.ibm.gaiandb.apps.sensormonitor.SensorMonitor

  • public final class SensorMonitor
extends DBConnector
    Records PC metrics and sensor data and stores the results in a table to be queried later.
    Author:
    Samir Talwar - stalwar@uk.ibm.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SensorMonitor(java.lang.String[] args)
      Initializes the sensor monitor by connecting to the database using the arguments provided, then creates a MetricMonitor which inserts the sensor values into its table.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SensorMonitor

        public SensorMonitor(java.lang.String[] args)
              throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException,
                     javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Initializes the sensor monitor by connecting to the database using the arguments provided, then creates a MetricMonitor which inserts the sensor values into its table.
        Parameters:
        args - An array containing, in order, the JDBC URL, username, and password.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the Derby client driver class cannot be found.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if an interrupt occurs while sleeping between connection attempts.
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Creates a new SensorMonitor and begins reading and storing sensor data.
        Parameters:
        args - The program arguments.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping.

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Commences reading the sensors, and handles any disconnects by attempting to reconnect.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the program is interrupted while sleeping.

      • addSensors

        protected void addSensors()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Adds monitors which read values from the sensors and return them.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
